EmailTemplate.name: L&S Typed versus Design Format
EmailTemplate.subject: L&S Typed versus Design Format
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom.
Please confirm which format you wish to file your Trademark application under (“design” or “typed”).
Marks in design format usually contain specific designs, pictures, artwork or fonts that the applicant wishes to protect. Under a design format, the mark will be protected only if it is used EXACTLY the way it appears on the logo that is provided to the USPTO. In other words, the applicant cannot change the font, position or style of the mark without losing protection rights.
Trademark applications submitted in a typed format are filed solely to protect the mark’s wording, without claim to any designs or artwork. Marks filed in a typed format can be used and altered at the applicant’s discretion, so long as the words (the “literal element”) remain the same (and the alterations do not result in a mark that is likely to be confused with another entity’s mark). In other words, the applicant may use the mark in any font style or color, and maintain Trademark protection. Under a typed format, a copy of the logo is not needed.
Whether you decide to file your Trademark application under a design or typed format is entirely up to you. LegalZoom is not a law firm and cannot provide legal advice. We will provide general factual information and prepare the application in accordance with your directions.
With this is mind, please reply to this email and let us know how you would like us to proceed with your application.
Please feel free to contact our Customer Care Team if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at 1.800.773.0888. Our Customer Care Team is available Mon-Fri 5am to 7pm PT; Saturday 7am to 4pm PT.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
tel 877.818.8787 | fax 323.389.0658 www.LegalZoom.com | 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
